name: Double Sleeping Pad - Self Inflating 4" Extra-Thick for 2 Person with Pillow Built-in Foot Pump Inflatable Sleeping Mat for Backpacking, Hiking, Traveling, Tent, Portable Camping Mat
short_description: 【4‘’ Ultra-Thick Double Sleeping Pad with Pillows】Camping sleeping pad is designed with a larger size and thicker: 79.8” X 53.5” and 4 inches extra thickness after inflating, which provides generous space and strong support, big enough for 2 person, won't touch the ground no matter how you flip, camping pad built-in pillows are suitable for every sleeping position and gives you every comfortable and warm sleeping night.

【Fast Foot Pump to Inflate & 1s Deflation】Sleeping mat has a built-in foot pump that can be fully inflated with foot pressure in just 1-3 minutes. No need to pack an extra pump to save backpack travel. Besides, self inflating sleeping pad two double layer valves on the pillow can effectively prevent air leakage and achieve rapid deflation. Note: Please make sure to close the 2 valves on the back of the pillows before pumping air.

【Durable & Comfortable Camping Mat 】Our 2 person sleeping pad is made of ultra-tough 40D nylon and TPU coating for durability and tear resistant, making the mats suitable for a wide range of outdoor environments. Plus an ergonomic pressure-dispersing water ripple design and one-piece pillow, air pad providing ultimate comfort whether you are lying on your back, side or stomach.

【Ultralight & Portable, Easy Storage】This camping mattress pad is compact to be easily folded back in the 12” X 5.9” carry bag, and at an ultra-light weight of 3 pounds, inflatable sleeping pad can easily fit into your backpack, perfect for camping, hiking, backpacking, climbing and traveling without any burden on you. Besides, this backpacking sleeping pad is easy to clean, if there is any dust or dirt, just wipe it down with a damp cloth.

【Risk-Free Purchase】Yuzonc at your service! We hope you are happy with this camping sleeping pad! Owning it will bring you more pleasure. We're committed to providing our customers with the best possible experience. Just go outdoor and make memories with Yuzonc!

name: Elegear CumbreX Double Sleeping Pad for Camping, 4.7" Ultra-Thick Inflatable Camping Sleeping Pad 2 Person with Built-in Foot Pump, Portable Camping Sleeping Mat for Backpacking Hiking Tent,Green Full
short_description: 【4.7" Ultra-Thick Sleep Pad】Elegear Double Sleeping Pad brings comfort to the outdoors with 4.7-inch thickness (77" x 54" x 4.7" inflated) – 2X thicker than standard camping sleeping pads. While flimsy camping pads leave you counting rocks beneath your back, our camping mat creates an impenetrable, all-terrain buffer that locks in full-body support, even when shifting positions on uneven ground.

【Upgraded High-Support Structure】Built with an Internal Strap Support Structure, this inflatable sleeping pad delivers up to 2× stronger support than standard camping pads. Individually responsive air chambers contour to your body, dispersing pressure 3× more effectively than flat thermoformed pads while supporting up to 800 lbs of weight. The hexagonal-cell structure resists sagging, even for side sleepers, and the ergonomic built-in pillow helps maintain proper neck alignment—reducing stiffness and providing mattress-level support outdoors.

【Built-in Foot Pump】Skip messy mouth-blowing and heavy pumps! Elegear’s integrated foot pump inflates this backpacking sleeping pad effortlessly in 3 minutes. The dual-layer leakproof valves ensure airtight security overnight and 30-second deflation. Just remember to close the valves tightly before inflation. NOTE: the inflation time depends on the speed of your foot pressing.

【Durable & Portable】Made from durable nylon laminated with waterproof TPU, this 2 person sleeping pad is tear-resistant and built for harsh outdoor environments. The thickened film ensures that our inflatable camping pad is effectively puncture and moisture resistant without air leakage. Such a camping mattress for 2 person weighs only 5.5 lbs, ideal for family camping, hiking backpacking, car trips, or for guests at home.

【User Instructions】Please strictly follow the instructions to inflate. If any air leakage is found, first confirm whether the air valve is fully closed. Additionally, please note that the recommended maximum weight capacity of the sleeping pad should not exceed 800 lbs.

【We Care About You】Elegear guarantees to serve you! We hope you are happy with this camping sleeping pad! Owning it will bring you more pleasure. If you have any questions, suggestions, ideas, please feel free to contact us! In addition, this sleeping pad is easy to clean, just wipe it clean with a damp cloth and please do not use strong detergent.

name: Naturehike Compact King Size Air Mattress with Built-in USB Rechargeable Pump, Inflatable Mattresses, Blow up Mattress Air Bed for Home, Camping, Guests, Travel
short_description: NAUTREHIKE BLOCKBUSTER LAUNCH -Compact king size air mattress is: 79*71in/ 200*180cm, 𝒔𝒍𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒍𝒚 𝒏𝒂𝒓𝒓𝒐𝒘𝒆𝒓 𝒕𝒉𝒂𝒏 𝒖𝒔𝒖𝒂𝒍 𝒌𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝒔𝒊𝒛𝒆 𝒂𝒊𝒓 𝒎𝒂𝒕𝒕𝒓𝒆𝒔𝒔. If there is any problem with the air pump or air leakage, please contact Naturehike, we will provide a solution to your satisfaction! After 5000 times of roller rolling test and 450kg 24 hours of pressure test, it gives you a luxurious and comfortable experience

PATENTED BUILT-IN PUMP - Free extractable built-in inflatable pump, 3-minute one-click inflate or deflate, free your hands, a cup of coffee time you can lie comfortably on the mattress. Comes with USB cable for charging, one full charge can be used 3-5 times, no need to charge frequently. This built-in pump is also suitable for other inflatable mattresses from Naturehike. Patented dual vent nozzle, first layer inflates without leakage, second layer deflates quickly

HONEYCOMB LOAD BEARING SYSTEM - mimics the structure of a honeycomb. Provides moderate support, actual firmness may vary based on individual perception. The center of the mattress is filled with a composite column of high elasticity tension bands that provide softness and flexibility while dispersing pressure at multiple points of support. The mattress has a weight capacity of 661 pounds, allowing you to experience the comfort of being supported by clouds

LIGHTWEIGHT & COMPACT DESIGN - King size unfolding size: 78.7*71*10"/ 200*180*25cm, storing size: 16.5*13.4*6.7"/ 42*34*17cm. 24 times smaller after folding and storing, only the size of a basketball. With a weight of 13lbs/5.9kg, you can easily put the mattress into your backpack and start your new adventure after a full night's sleep

PREMIUM SAFETY MATERIALS - Skin-friendly flocked PVC fabric is formaldehyde-free, soothing and breathable, kids and pets can also use it without worry. Insulation treated fabric reduces friction static electricity. The center of the column is filled with static air, double cushioning pressure relief to reduce noise, you can turn over at will, and you can sleep soundly in any position. Suitable for outdoor camping/temporary visitors/home indoor/traveling hotel

RECOMMENDATIONS FOR USE: Suggested use temperature is above 50℉. After receiving it, first inflate the air pump and leave it for 8-12 hours, Please do not use the air pump while charging, air pump should be stored in a dry environment. It is recommended to turn off the power to cool down the air pump for 10 minutes after 5 minutes of continuous operation. Avoid overheating which may cause internal damage. Please do not over-inflate. The product is covered by a 2-year warranty

short_description: 【Upgraded Support & 4" Thick Sleep Support】Pretyw sleeping pad for camping is made with durable outdoor materials. Measuring 78x54 inches and inflating to 4 inches thick, it provides ample space and strong support for two people. The built-in pillow adds comfort and convenience, ensuring a great night’s sleep without touching the ground.

【Fast Foot Pump to Inflate & 1s Deflation】No need for hands, mouth, or an external pump to inflate our self-inflating camping sleeping pad. Simply step on the built-in foot pump, and it will fully inflate in 1-3 minutes. Note: Before inflating, find the two deflation valves at the back of the pillow and press them down firmly until both sealing rings are completely pushed in and sealed.

【Tough & Comfy Camping Mat】Our sleeping pad is made from ultra-thick 40D nylon with a multi-layer TPU design, ensuring excellent durability and waterproof performance. It won’t tear, even on rough terrain. Cleaning the inflatable camping mattress is easy—just wipe it down with a damp cloth if it gets dusty or dirty. Plus, the ergonomic pressure-relief wave pattern design provides ultimate comfort, whether you’re lying on your back, side, or stomach.

【Ultra Lightweight & Portable】This camping air mattress has a compact design and easily folds into a 10X5.9 inches carry bag. Weighing only 3 pounds, it can be effortlessly packed into a backpack or suitcase, adding no extra burden to your trip. Perfect for hiking, camping, backpacking, travel, climbing, and other outdoor activities, as well as for overnight guests at home.

【Risk-Free Purchase】 Pretyw is here to serve you. We want you to be fully satisfied with this camping sleeping pad. Owning it will bring more joy to your adventures. name: Intex 64778E Dura-Beam Standard Prestige Air Mattress: Fiber-Tech – Full Size – Hand-Held Battery Pump – 10in Bed Height – 600lb Weight Capacity
short_description: ✔ FIBER-TECH BEAM CONSTRUCTION – Comprised of thousands of high-strength polyester fibers that provide enhanced comfort, stability and support; Fiber-Tech Beam Construction can withstand more weight and pressure without losing its comfort or stability
✔ DURABILITY – Unlike traditional air beds that tend to sink or dip over time, Dura-Beam Air Mattresses are designed to withstand the weight of the sleeper without sagging or losing its shape

✔ INCLUDES HAND-HELD BATTERY PUMP – Quickly inflate and deflate the Dura-Beam Prestige Downy Air Mattress with the hand-held battery pump included; the air pump opeates on 6 C-cell batteries (Batteries not included)

✔ VELVETY SLEEPING SURFACE – The air mattress features a velvety sleeping surface that is not only soft and comfortable, but also easy to clean; this makes it an ideal choice for use as a guest bed or for camping trips

✔ STRETCH – At first inflation the material will STRETCH, which is sometimes misinterpreted as leaking; You will sense a loss of pressure, that's just the bed stretching, simply re-inflate the bed again; the bed will fully settle within 2-3 nights
product_description: The Dura-Beam Standard Prestige Air Mattress is a versatile and durable air mattress designed for both indoor and outdoor use. Fiber-Tech interior construction provides reliable support and durability, while the velvety sleeping surface ensures a comfortable night's sleep. The mattress features an extra-wide opening 2-in-1 valve, making inflation and deflation quick and easy with the included hand-held battery pump. The mattress inflates in approximately 3.5 minutes and measures 54 inches by 75 inches by 10 inches with a weight capacity limit of 600 pounds. When not in use, the bed folds compactly for easy storage and transport, making it a convenient option for camping trips, overnight guests, or as an extra bed at home.
